## Sampler.getSampler() method

Returns the underlying `WebGLSampler` object once ready.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getSampler(): Promise<WebGLSampler>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;WebGLSampler&gt;

The underlying `WebGLSampler` object.
